comprehensive_overview: MVAPICH2 is an open-source MPI implementation for InfiniBand, iWARP, and RoCE communication protocols which delivers high performance and scalability on a wide variety of HPC systems.
core_features:
1. High performance and scalability on HPC systems
2. Support for InfiniBand, iWARP, and RoCE communication protocols
3. Open-source MPI implementation
4. Efficient use of hardware features for enhanced performance
5. Tuning and optimization capabilities for specific HPC applications
